metadata.title: CVE-2021-33192 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability in the HTML pages of Apache Jena Fuseki allows an attacker to execute arbitrary javascript on certain page views. This issue affects Apache Jena Fuseki from version 2.0.0 to version 4.0.0 (inclusive).

criterions.comment: apache-jena package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
